Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Add images to your Copilot prompts in M365 applications chat in government clouds
Description:
Add images now to Copilot chat in applications of Word, PowerPoint, Excel, OneNote and Outlook. Available to government cloud (GCC) environments. Ask questions about a picture or screenshot, extract text from an image, identify key takeaways from a chart or table, translate image information into copy, ask for suggestions on how to improve content, or generate alt text.
GA date: June CY2025
